summary: Lofen the Stout can be found at the The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold. Just leave her alone.
descriptionHtml:
Lofen the Stout can be found "hanging out" at the The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold. She was a former apprentice at the College but was let go. She didn't go very far. She is perfectly happy to spend her time at the inn, so please let her stay there. No armor is going to fit her, just keep her safe and don't ask if she'd like to tag along with you. She'll say she knows shock spells, don't listen. If you must travel with her then make her useful. Give her a staff, or four...

Fun Facts:
Level 6-80
Combat Mage Destruction
Potential Marriage Fraction
Protected


Credits to:

Razorwire [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10111/?]Chubby Races for Skyrim - BBW[/url]
-RobidyBobidy
